abstract: Daniel Isom II, Missouri public safety director appointed by Gov Jay Nixon following fatal shooting of unarmed black teenager Michael Brown by white Ferguson Police Officer Darren Wilson, announces his plans to resign after only six months in the position.
lead_paragraph: Daniel Isom II was appointed the state’s public safety director six months ago amid the fallout over the police shooting of Michael Brown.

headline.main: Missouri Safety Official, Hired in Ferguson Aftermath, Quits
headline.print_headline: Missouri Safety Official, Hired in Ferguson Aftermath, Quits

snippet: Daniel Isom II was appointed the state’s public safety director six months ago amid the fallout over the police shooting of Michael Brown.
